a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Test scores of AI systems on various capabilities relative to human
Within each domain, the initial performance of the AI is set to –100. Human performance is used as a baseline, set to zero.
When the AI’s performance crosses the zero line, it scored more points than humans.

text.textPath: Human performance, as the benchmark, is set to zero
Human performance, as the benchmark, is set to zero
The capability of each AI system is normalized to an initial performance of –100
The capability of each AI system is normalized to an initial performance of –100

text.tspan: Note: For each capability, the first year always shows a baseline of –100, even if better performance was recorded later that year.
